snippet: Prospects are murky for the efforts of two prosecutors appointed by Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to lead investigations into recent disclosures of government secrets.
abstract: News analysis; prospects are murky for the efforts of two prosecutors appointed by Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr to lead investigations into recent leaks of government secrets; historically, the vast majority of leak-related investigations have turned up nothing conclusive, and several of the nine that have been prosecuted collapsed; still, the Obama administration is facing intense pressure to identify and make examples of any officials who helped bring to light a series of disclosures.
lead_paragraph: Prospects are murky for the efforts of two prosecutors appointed by Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to lead investigations into recent disclosures of government secrets.

headline.main: For U.S. Inquiries on Leaks, a Difficult Road to Prosecution
headline.print_headline: Finding Sources of Leaked Secrets Is Hard; Bringing a Case Is Harder

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
